Ext.form.field.HtmlEditor Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.1.0 Ext.form.field.HtmlEditor
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function() {
    Ext.tip.QuickTipManager.init(); // enable tooltips
    Ext.create('Ext.form.HtmlEditor', {
        width: 580,
        height: 250,
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
